column5: Headed out for Some Crappies after work tonight and found some nice slabs and a few blue gills to go with them . was a nice calm no wind eve and the sun was shineing and the fish were hungry .managed about 17 crappies and a doz blue gills . all on bobber and minnow a ft under the suffrace ..got home got the knife out and the beer batter ..yummy ...
Thanks for the report.  Nice photo~~~ The last one makes me really really hungry~!!!

Looks like you had a nice dinner!.  Though you don't get much meat off those guys.  I've never seen Bluegills that colour - they seem a reddish colour (unless its just the lighting)  Nice catch all the same. Thanks for sharing.  007
They are more purpleish then red ..and big blue gills have lots of back meat ..and very tastey alote like perch if not better ..

Looks like you had a nice evening out there Steve - might give it a try on the weekend - what else might one expect to catch in the lower river ( in season ) ?  Don   Looks like lake ontario might be a wash this weekend ( winds ) so I am looking for another option.
looks like u had a good time!! nice fishes too!  can u describe to me what "crappie" tastes like? never tried it..crap-pie i dunno.  ... Bud

Lower grand you never no what you will catch ..Channle Cats ,Yellow Belly Cats ,Bowfin ,Crappies, Trout, Blue Gills ,White Perch ,Silver Bass , OOS Walleye, Pike, Small Mouth, Large Mouth ..the grand has just about everything in right now..me i will be o Lake Ont Fri Sat Sun ....as for what Crappie taste like sorta like Perch but flakey fluffy meat

ahh ok, i like perch, so i will have to try it... i was shorefishing port D today by the lighthouse, but nothing hitting to hard...  thanks fishmaster, i often wondered what crappie tasted like..  Bud
Nice fish, nice pics , good report . I think i might have to try for crappie's and bluegills one of these days looks like they can be very productive.

Nice report and pics there Steve, right down to the fillets!!!  Pan fishing with a light action rod and a float is one of my favourite ways to fish.  Always takes me back to the simpler way of fishing when I was younger.  Not to mention the great eating!  I wish there were more panfishing reports.  Thanks for yours!
NICE LITTLE MEAL BRO!!! GREAT COLOURS ON THOSE FISH!!
Great catch,and gotta love those big slabs,...and man are they tasty,thanks for the report and pics...cheers
My mouth is watering looking at that last picture - I hope to get into a plateful on Saturday night!  WTG!!
so do you call big bluegills slabs too? last year i caught one that was just over 10" long but had an 11" girth
